definition: to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
Yasukuni Shrine, Shinto shrine in Tokyo to Japanese war dead, controversial as burial ground of several Class A war criminals
expression or emotion showing in one's eyes/meaningful glance/wink/eyesight (dialect)

sentences.english: And so Sarai took it upon herself to solve God’s problem.
sentences.chinese: 撒莱在自己解决神的问题。

sentences.english: Because our triune God is the God of all grace.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们的三位一体神是充满恩典的神。

sentences.english: I will praise God's name in song and glorify him with thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 我要以诗歌赞美神的名，以感谢称他为大。

sentences.english: P is for Pray-reading, with prayers chew God's Word.
sentences.chinese: 是祷读，借由祷告来咀嚼神的话。

sentences.english: The people, however, continued to sacrifice at the high places, but only to the Lord their God.
sentences.chinese: 百姓却仍在丘坛上献祭，只献给耶和华他们的神。

sentences.english: Shehuo is a continuation of an ancient tradition of offering sacrifices to Land Gods and Fire Gods.
sentences.chinese: 社火是古代祭祀土地神和火神活动的延续。

sentences.english: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
sentences.chinese: 彼得和众使徒回答说，顺从神，不顺从人，是应当的。

sentences.english: So they moved the ark of the God of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 于是将以色列神的约柜运到那里去。

sentences.english: I will say unto God my rock, Why hast thou forgotten me?
sentences.chinese: 我要对神我的磐石说，你为何忘记我呢。

sentences.english: This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 这耶稣，神已经叫他复活了，我们都为这事作见证。

sentences.english: God is revealed in the hiddenness of the external form.
sentences.chinese: 神的启示隐藏于外在的形体中。

sentences.english: God really does change his people.
sentences.chinese: 神的确在改变他的子民。

sentences.english: Firstly, Ezekiel had a vision of God and His sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 首先，以西结得到神的异象，并认识神的主权。

sentences.english: Firstly, Ezekiel had a vision of God and His sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 首先，以西结得到神的异象，并认识神的主权。

sentences.english: Graphics on screen The Kingdom will return to Jerusalem and It will be ruled over by a marvellous King.
sentences.chinese: 神的国将回到耶路撒冷，由一位了不起的王作统治。

sentences.english: Yea, thou castest off fear, and restrainest prayer before God.
sentences.chinese: 你是废弃敬畏的意，在神面前阻止敬虔的心。

definition: Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
god/spirit/demon/occult or supernatural entities in general
